title: Solving Multiclass Learning Problems via Error-Correcting Output Codes

On the speech recognition, letter recognition and vowel data sets, we employed the opt system distributed by Oregon Graduate Institute (Barnard & Cole, 1989). This implements the conjugate gradient algorithm and updates the gradient after each complete pass
